transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haanji madam.
Executive: Rashmi ji Preeti baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haanji haanji boliye.
Executive: Kaise ho sir?
Customer: Badhiya madam, pranam aap bataiye.
Executive: Achha maine actually call kiya tha woh subah se call do teen baar laga chuki hu mai aapka primary wala number na but meri baat nahi ho pa rahi hai.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Toh mujhe thoda sa clarification vagera dena tha uske upar woh jo outdoor gym equipment wala jo category hai usko lekar ke. Toh mera na abhi matlab meri jo piche team hai matlab unke saath mein discussion chal raha tha matlab jo backend pe sara yeh sab dekhti hai unke saath mein. Toh I have come up with some sort of feedback, some sort of jo kaam hame change karna hai aur some sort of what they have done. Toh isme na pehla cheez yeh hai ki jo outdoor gym equipment wala jo category hai aapka isme I have discussed with them ki why you are not able to consume the buyleads kyunki woh feedback mujhe mila tha ki aapke end se aap lead dekhte hai aur woh lead jo hai directly past lead mein jaake dikhati hai hamare samne dikhti nahi hai.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Toh unhone mujhe bataya tha ki isme problem yeh aa rahi hai ki aapka first ki yeh jo category hai is category mein jo average lead consumption time hai matlab koi bhi lead aati hai aur woh sold out ho jati hai it is 18 seconds only matlab 18 seconds tak hi koi lead, lead jo hai woh live dikhti hai. Dusra jab unhone matlab yeh past woh lead jab maine unke saath mein discuss ki thi jo dikh rahi thi aur nahi dikh rahi thi toh unhone kaha woh screen par aayi thi but ho sakta hai us time par us time page mein you were not in buylead wala page ya toh kisi aage piche kisi page pe honge ya kuch bhi honge but you were not on the buylead wala page.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Toh waha pe woh lead jo hai woh within fraction of seconds it has been sold out. Ab ispe kya hai ki first kuch SEO jo hai woh team already matlab ispe kar rahi hai because this is a high sold category toh uska traffic vagera badhane ke liye. Dusra isme na humko ek hi kaam karna hai woh kaam yeh karna hai ki aapko aapke system par yeh auto refresher laga hua hai kya sir?
Customer: Haanji haan.
Executive: Auto refresher laga hua hai aapke system par?
Customer: Haanji haanji.
Executive: Ek aur bas mujhe yeh check karna hai team ko na aapko yeh bolna hai ki jo bhi aapka recent wala jo page hai matlab ek toh all India wala page along with that jo recent wala page hai woh dono pe na hi filter aapka constant laga rahe matlab aisa hota hai ki kai baar filter recommended pe hota hai aur lead recent se hi nikal jati hai. Toh aapka recent wala aur India wala jo page hai yeh dono ko saath mein click karke aur phir aapka jo hai isme auto refresher laga ho woh aapko bas dhyan rakhna hai kyunki lead aati hai aur 18 second mein kya hai ki hum kahi pe bhi ho sakte hai maan lijiye ki directly 18 second kitni hi der hoti hai sir. Kuch kar rahe hai ya kuch bhi hai toh woh lead sold out pe chali gayi ya phir hum lead manager wale page pe the yeh kuch hai woh toh screen matlab khuli rahe auto refresher pe recent aur India wala filter aapka ek saath laga rahe toh aap uski lead jo hai consume kar paoge. Haan toh yeh maine sare analysis unse karwaye the aur aap abhi yeh karo kyunki mai na yeh dekh rahi thi sir ki is month mein abhi tak kal mujhe do dikh rahi thi is month mein char lead humne outdoor gym equipment ki consume ki hai kal it was two yesterday toh shayad kal mein do lead kharid paye honge. Toh bas itna dhyan rakhna hai sir ki aapka.
Customer: Pehle jaisa na iska response nahi raha IndiaMART ka na jaise pehle use karte the.
Executive: Mai aapko bata deti hu sir response ka jaha tak keh rahe hai kya haan pehle lead abhi dheere dheere na kam hota ja raha hai sara kuch na.
Customer: Nahi nahi mai aapko bata deti hu sir response kam nahi ho raha mai aapko ek baat batati hu isme na response kam nahi ho raha in fact jo outdoor gym equipment wala hai na ispe traffic badha hi hai kam nahi hua hai. October mein down hua tha kyunki October was the month which is festive season tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Meri baat suniye pehle pata hai kya pehle leads ko time milta tha thoda aaram se banda ghante ghante tak padi bhi rehti thi ab aapka kya ho gaya na ki ab maine do ladke do system pe bithaye hue hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aur auto refresh laga rakha hai. Samajh gaye? Aur jitni jaldi unko chhodiye mai bhi dekhta hu na aur karta hu within two seconds lead gayab.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ab madam hamare yaha 100 lead.
Executive: Haan mai bol rahi hu.
Customer: Haan woh do second ke andar lead gayab phir madam fayda kya hai aise karake yeh 5 lakh 5.5 lakh isme lagana usse jyada toh yaar insta mein, Instagram mein kaam aa jata hai promotion laga ke chhod do.
Executive: Mai aapko ek baat batati hu ki lead aisa nahi hai ki aap kharid nahi pa rahe piche do mahine mein maine dekha outdoor gym equipment ka hi aapka problem chal raha hai outdoor gym equipment wali jo aapne category.
Customer: Madam abhi aap 15-20 din se na ab do teen din se jab se maine complaint ya query open ki tab se mere ko toh shukar hai ek do gym set dikh bhi rahi hai.
Executive: Char lead is mahine mein kharidi hai char lead aapne kharid paye hai kyunki maine waha pe feedback bhi diya tha I was not on to the call matlab mai call kyunki mai chah rahi thi ki pehle mai kaam kara ke de du kyunki mere ko jab waha se bhi team bol rahi hai maine kaha jab tak mai kaam pura nahi kara dungi tab tak phir mai call karke karu kya better hai ki mai I will come up with some sort of solution ki iska solution kya kya ho sakta hai. Maine jo aapke jo handle kar rahe hai unko yeh bhi recommend kiya tha ki sir agar challenge aa raha hai toh hum aisa bhi kar sakte hai ki kyunki yeh high sold category hai toh we can replace it to another category multi gym ho gaya ya gym equipment ho gaya jaha pe yeh tiki aur.
Customer: Nahi nahi madam outdoor, outdoor jo hamara dhandha hai jis cheez ka dhandha hamara hai hum usko kaise chhod de? Aise aise phir aadmi 2.5-2.5 lakh rupaye kyun nahi lagata agar yeh category jaruri na hoti kisi ke liye.
Executive: Thik hai toh mai aapko phir itna bata deti hu sir dekho do cheez humko karke rakhni padegi ispe ki aapka ek recent wala tab aur uske saath saath aapka India wala tab yeh do hi tab khule rahe matlab utna aap ek baar ensure kara lena lead aap kharid paoge aisa nahi hai ki traffic kam hai traffic aa raha hai.
Executive: Toh bas yeh do cheeze hai kyunki kai baar aisa hota hai ki we are on to idhar udhar kahi pe bhi hai toh average maine aapko bata diya ki itne seconds mein lead uska sold out ho raha hai sir.
Customer: Madam maine na aapke woh madam kaun kya naam ka jo mujhse abhi coordinate Saloni madam unke samne dikhaya ki within jaise hi auto refreshment auto refresh woh refresh hua page samne aaya just now it was zero second hi tha maine click kiya sold out.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Haan toh mai aapko.
Customer: Unko live karke dikhaya maine live.
Executive: Sir dekho isme na ek cheez aur aapko thoda sa dekhna padega ki ek baar mujhe aap yeh bhi dekh lo ki jo bhi lead hai aisa ki dikha matlab chalo us us time frame mein toh yeh hai ki woh clicks sabka ek saath lag raha hai toh consume ho gayi but har time aisa nahi hota kyunki char lead aap is mahine mein kharid paye ho sir. Toh waha pe itna bas aap ek baar.
Customer: Aur yeh char lead bhi mere ko lagta hai yeh do teen din mein hi kharide hai maine jab se query open ki usse piche toh kuch bhi nahi tha.
Executive: Nahi nahi mai bata rahi hu maine dekha tha kal kal aapne kharida hoga kyunki do lead toh maine jab kal call kiya tha aapne unko phone handover kiya tha jo handle kar rahe hai aapke yaha se so it was two yesterday matlab kal do kharid kal tak mujhe do dikh rahi thi aaj mujhe char dikh rahi hai toh matlab do lead kal hi kharidi hogi kyunki mai bhi daily basis pe profile open kar hi rahi hu aapka. Toh char kal ki date mein do aayi hongi but maine pura discussion kiya hai detail mein aur isme jo current solution mere paas mein hai woh yahi hai ki aapko bas waha pe India wala page aur recent wala recommended wala nahi recent wala auto refresh mode pe laga ke hi rakhna padega woh lead jo hai woh seconds ki 18 seconds pe ja rahi hai bahut hi jyada high sold hai toh uspe time lagana padega aur lekin yeh cheez achi hai ki sir dekho usko fast supplier hi consume karte hai toh fast mein phir woh conversion ke chances bhi badh jate hai koi bhi lead aapke haath mein aa rahi hai ek there is a high chance to get it converted toh woh thoda sa aapko ek baar dekhna padega sir. Bas itna team se aap kara ke rakhiye aur baki ka piche ka jo bhi SEO vagera hai woh maine unko already feedback de diya tha hamari backend team ko usse SEO woh category pe maine kaha humne dedh mahine pehle SEO kiya tha ek baar hum usko phir se schedule kar denge toh woh SEO kara hi rahe hai uske upar.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
Customer: Haan thik hai ji SEO matlab kya hai?
Executive: SEO matlab yeh hota hai search engine optimization matlab woh traffic kitna kya hai usme koi scope hai kya kya hai woh piche se promotion karti hai us category ka matlab Google par. Toh woh sab feedback diya tha toh woh woh log kara rahe hai matlab SEO hota hai usi se traffic generation badhta hai. Toh unhone kaha ki hum matlab isliye woh log category ke upar kaam karte hi hai toh unke saath mein na kal matlab baat hui thi ek do baar meri aur aaj bhi phir subah hui hai toh conclude yahi hai unhone kaha hum aapko yeh tak bata denge ki customer was there on that time jab woh lead aayi ya nahi aayi kyunki woh toh screen time jaise ab bahut jyada lead dekh karte ho toh sari cheeze nikal aati hai toh woh screen time mein jaise aapne kuch bhi kiya maan lijiye aap sirf itna hi chale gaye ki aap lead manager wale page pe thi aur woh lead aayi aur sold out pe dikh rahi hai ki hum toh online hi baithe the but yeh sold out mein dikh rahi hai itna tak validate kara diya toh ek hi solution unhone bola ki isme bas ek hi solution hai aapko.
Customer: Is tarah toh madam is tarah toh dekhiye aap phir yeh toh higher package walo ko kuch mil nahi raha yahi lead aapki maximizer mein bhi jayegi.
Executive: Mai nahi aisa nahi hota ki maximizer mein jayegi sir leader ho mai aapko itna jarur bolungi ki kuch na kuch benefit milta hai itna traffic aur itna sab advantage unko nahi milta hai jitna aapko milta hai har terms mein hota hai sir yeh maximizer wala customer uske liye woh upar hi sold out ho ja rahi hai direct enquiry aake woh upar hi customer ko de de rahe hai toh woh bechare kya karenge jo response yaha hai woh maximizer wale ke liye bilkul nil batta sannata hai sir jo dikh hi nahi raha hai toh aap ek sochiye na ki sare premium customer apna matlab shop lekar ke aage hi baithe hue hai toh buyer requirement wahi fulfill ho ja rahi hai why they will go on that page aur waha par kyun jayega. Toh woh sab kahi na kahi hota hi hai aur isme aapke profile pe jo bhi promotional activities thi woh sari maine kara di hai you will get a response aapko bas apne end pe jo kaam karna hai woh yeh hai auto refresher ke saath India plus recent click yeh dono hi on karke rakhne hai aapko.
Customer: Chaliye yeh yeh bataiye aap haan sir yeh phone pe kaise kar sakte hai kyunki ab phone pe application kya toh koi kaam nahi raha.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Kyunki ab phone pe ab any time hum desktop ke samne suppose kijiye ki ladke bhi 6 baje tak ya 7 baje tak baithe hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Uske baad kaise phone pe kuch iska jugaad hai ki hum kar sakte hai?
Executive: Mobile application hai aapke paas mein installed hai IndiaMART ka mobile application?
Customer: Hai na madam lekin woh koi kaam ka nahi hai na agar wohi pe uth ja kyunki ispe toh iPhone hai jaise notification bhi aata hai hum click karte hai jab tak woh toh gol gol ghumne mein hi khatam lead.
Executive: Nahi nahi toh aapka isme jo mobile application hai woh jo first number hai unka android phone hai ya unka bhi kya hai matlab unka kaunsa phone hai?
Customer: Android bhi hai madam mere paas toh dono hi hai android bhi hai woh bhi.
Executive: Aapke paas android hai haan toh mobile application mein usme bhi recent wale page par na click karke dekhte rahiye bas usme yahi kar sakte hai uska time aap bhi nahi laga sakte aur mai yeh bhi dekhungi night kis time pe jyada flow aata hai kyunki of course raat mein bhi sare log free hokar apna apna kaam raat mein lekar ke baithe hai toh woh thoda sa dekhna hi padega ki usme matlab kaise usko kar sakte hai mobile application hai agar toh waha pe recent wala jo filter hai na sir usko laga kar ke rakhiye. Relevant wala sirf purchasing pattern pe chalta hai recent wala out of the sari category jitni bhi aa rahi hai unpe freshly jitni bhi hai sari dikh rahi hongi aapko. Aisa hota hai na kai baar niche bhi chali jati hai lead kai baar baki ki category ke upar dikh rahi hoti hai woh niche chali jati hai toh recent wale page ko dekhte rahiye refresh karke.
Customer: Thik hai madam.
Executive: Thik hai sir haan okay all right haan thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough buyleads.

- Leads disappear quickly, within 2 seconds.

- Wants to know how to use phone application.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about auto-refresh feature.

- Executive suggested keeping India and recent tabs open.

- Executive informed about SEO being done.

- Executive suggested using the recent filter on mobile app.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, auto refresh, seo, mobile app
